name: Tag ActiveCampaign contacts based on NPS rating (stored in Airtable)
description:
Use this template to automatically create (or update) an ActiveCampaign contact and a tag based on the Net Promoter Score metric rating stored in Airtable (see [this base](https://airtable.com/shrdrLDBy73l8eDYN) for a reference).

Please create 3 tags in your ActiveCampaign account: 'promoter', 'passive', and 'detractor'.

Also, your Airtable table has to contain the 'Created time' field of type 'Created time' to be able to watch new records.
